name: Rabvanture
description:
Storyline :

A cute little rabbit is trapped in a deep cave.

Would you like to help her to get out of the cave?

Genre :

Platformer

Objective :

Get the key and open the door to go to the next level.

Control :

For Windows, 

A - Move left

D - Move right

SPACE - Jump

Hold SPACE - Jump higher

For Android,

Left Arrow Button  - Move left

Right Arrow Button - Move right

Up Arrow Button - Jump

Hold Up Arrow Button- Jump higher

P.S : 

This game is for my school assignment, so it has not been finished yet.

This game now still has only three levels. Later I'll add it more.
